mapper.select: SELECT m.mapimg, m.mapname, h.heroimg, h.heroname, b.title, b.content1, b.no, b.hno, b.mno FROM BOARD AS b inner join HERO AS h ON (b.hno = h.no) INNER JOIN MAP AS m ON (b.mno = m.`no`) WHERE b.no = ${no}
SELECT b.no, b.title, h.heroname FROM BOARD AS b inner join HERO AS h ON (b.hno = h.no) ORDER BY DATE DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT b.no, b.title, h.heroname FROM BOARD AS b inner join HERO AS h ON (b.hno = h.no) ORDER BY HITS DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT b.no, h.heroimg, m.mapname, b.title, b.`DATE`, b.hits, b.id , h.heroname , content1, h.no as hno FROM BOARD AS b inner join HERO AS h ON (b.hno = h.no) INNER JOIN MAP AS m ON (b.mno = m.`no`) WHERE b.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( title, content1, id, date, hno, mno) VALUES( #{title}, #{content1}, #{id}, #{date}, #{hno}, #{mno})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET title = #{title}, hno = #{hno}, mno = #{mno}, content1 = #{content1} WHERE no = #{no}
